mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNTBOOK_EXPENSE( EXPENSE_CASH , EXPENSE_CARD , EXPENSE_NO , EXPENSE_DETAIL , EXPENSE_DATE , EXPENSE_REMAIN_AMOUNT , EXPENSE_MEMO , CATEGORY_NO , USER_ID ) VALUES (#{cash},#{card},EXPENSE_NO_SEQ.nextval,#{detail},sysdate,#{remainAmount},#{memo},#{category.no},#{user.id} );
